title: LL = LLa ?
content: Do you think that levellord and levellass are actually the same person? I've heard at least one person suggest this, and I've been wondering if it is true for a while.

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content: We really have no evidence one way or the other, but it doesn't make sense to me that one person would want two aliases.  I'm going with my gut feeling that they're not actually the same person at all.[img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content:
Trust me on this. They are NOT the same person.

It doesn't even matter because neither of them come to the PCKF anymore.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content:
I always though it was funny that LL and LLa both had an identical style of writing (and typos), as well as both having an apparent love of Jazz Jackrabbit.

And Gal, how can we trust you on this? You tried to convince everyone you *were* LL for a brief period of time... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

(And KT, if you think it doesn't make sense that one person would want two aliases, you never read many of LL's posts...making sense was never really that important to her... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] )[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content:
Yeah I remember that... that was actually pretty fun. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

I mean I have pictures of both people. (Neither of which I will post online as they wouldn't like that.)

I DO know that they are different people because LLa' was posting on the PCKF while LL was on a 3 month "rehabilitation" program. I know that because I have letters saying so and whatnot. If you don't believe me, well whatever.

Yes they surprisingly do have the same writing style. I think LL signed in as LLa a few times and posted here. (I wouldn't put it past her.)-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]It doesn't even matter because neither of them come to the PCKF anymore. [hr][/quote]
This place has become quiet. Nobody to riot with anymore.-----------------

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content:
They are definitely different people.

LL just stopped coming at some point, and LLa is happy with her boyfriend, after all. It's too bad really, they're fun to have around.____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content:
LL is on MSN everyday, for the interested.------------------------------

title: Re: LL = LLa ?
content:
Yes! It's true! We're the same person! How did you find out my secret identity? Weren't glasses and a suit a good enough disguise? (Seriously superman, how do you pull it off?)

This raises the wonderful specter of the internet; how can you prove who you are? Photos? Faked or stolen. Being two places at once? It can be done. Differences in personality, likes, hobbies or actions? Easy enough to fake. In the end, how can I prove I'm not LL? What would be conclusive evidence? Certainly I've seen two keeners so far use another identity somewhere else, not on this board, but still, it would have been easy enough.

And of course I like Jazz Jackrabbit; I've been playing it for years, Adis had the only computer in our neighborhood, so we had the same games (Including Keen.) for 5 years. A girl gets attached during that period, I also like Duke Nukum 1.

Oh, and LL is no more, I'm killing her off in favor of my new persona, Gary. You'll see him in a few weeks.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: ogm t3h nutz0rd
content: Are you serious?  Are you actually the same person, or was that just sarcasm?  That's another thing that's harder to recognize on the interwebz. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]   If so, then why???

title: Re: ogm t3h nutz0rd
content:
I love this kind of sarcasm. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] ____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].

title: Re: ogm t3h nutz0rd
content:
Oh but it's so true Da Vince; I've even got LL's account on DA banned, so I can spend more time as this persona. All I have to do now is kill her off. I'm not planning on anything showy, maybe she could do one of those 'I'm leaving the community because I've got other things to do' posts.

@ Keeg Tech (Of course it's all in fun! I'm sorry if it's a bit confusing, I don't use sarcasm as much or as well as I should. However, you have to admit that it's within the realms of possibility that I am indeed LL.)[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: ogm t3h nutz0rd
content:
Oops. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oops.gif[/img] I have this problem a lot. Which is rather odd because sarcasm runs in my family. Even I use it frequently.

Although something deep down told me that you didn't really mean it anyway.[img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]

As it is then, it should be no surprise to me if we find a sarcasm gene, and no I am not being sarcastic.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

title: Re: ogm t3h nutz0rd
content: My IP changes every few days thanks to the wonder of dynamic addresses - if I ever feel the need to change IP in a hurry my modem just needs to be power cycled (and a Google search for 'open proxy' means you don't need to be particularly rich to have a wide assortment of IPs to choose from...)<font color="#EEF2EE">[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]</font>
